headline: Citigroup seeks to trim external IT contractors
summary: The bank intends to decrease its reliance on external IT contractors, reducing their share of the workforce from 50% to 20%.

headline: Citi, Apollo Test Private Credit Tie-Up in Boeing Unit Sale
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Citigroup Inc. and Apollo Global Management Inc. are offering potential buyers of Boeing Co.’s Jeppesen navigation unit the option to fund the acquisition through the pair’s nascent private credit partnership, according to people familiar with the matter.Most Read from BloombergTrump DEI Purge Hits Affordable Housing GroupsHow Britain’s Most Bike-Friendly New Town Got BuiltICE Eyes Massive California Tent Facility Amid Space ConstraintsThe Dark Prophet of Car-Clogged CitiesWashing

headline: US banks turn to SEC to dodge climate, social shareholder proposals
summary: The agency has largely denied the requests, ruling that banks must put the requests to disclose its clean energy financing ratios and indigenous rights practices to a vote.
